Package utils

Class SafeSAX

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.SafeSAX

  • public class SafeSAX
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an extension of the original SAXReader with a safe dtd resolver. Silences missing dtd definition errors during document loading. The SafeSAX class serves as a "serial access" protocol for XML by providing a static read/1 method to load a given XML document. If XML could not be loaded, it tries to load the XML document with a generic resolver.

    About SAX protocol:
    {@link http://www2.informatik.hu-berlin.de/~xing/Lib/Docs/jaxp/docs/tutorial/sax/index.html}

    For further information about Java XML API, please visit:
    {@link http://www2.informatik.hu-berlin.de/~xing/Lib/Docs/jaxp/docs/tutorial/TOC.html#intro}

    Author:
    Wilfried Elmenreich

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static org.dom4j.Document read(java.io.File loadFile,
                                      boolean reportError)
        Creates a new SAXReader and tries to load the given file into an XML document. In case the dtd could not be loaded, the process is restarted using a generic resolver
        Parameters:
        loadFile - the file to be loaded from
        reportError - if false, errors will be swallowed
        Returns:
        the XML document
